Description_lang: You have a chance to obtain a Bottled Essence by defeating powerful enemies as well as by completing dungeons, raids and other various activities on the Dragon Isles.

description_blz.en_US: You have a chance to obtain a Bottled Essence by defeating powerful enemies as well as by completing dungeons, raids and other various activities on the Dragon Isles.
description_blz.es_MX: Tienes una probabilidad de obtener una esencia embotellada si derrotas enemigos poderosos y si completas calabozos, bandas y otras actividades en las Islas Dragón.
description_blz.pt_BR: Você tem chance de obter Essência Engarrafada ao derrotar inimigos poderosos, bem como ao concluir masmorras, raides e outras atividades diversas nas Ilhas do Dragão.
description_blz.de_DE: Ihr habt eine Chance, abgefüllte Essenz zu erlangen, wenn Ihr auf den Dracheninseln mächtige Gegner besiegt oder Dungeons, Schlachtzüge sowie verschiedene andere Aktivitäten abschließt.
description_blz.en_GB: You have a chance to obtain a Bottled Essence by defeating powerful enemies as well as by completing dungeons, raids and other various activities on the Dragon Isles.
description_blz.es_ES: Existe la posibilidad de que obtengas esencia embotellada al derrotar enemigos poderosos y al completar mazmorras, bandas y diferentes actividades en las Islas Dragón.
description_blz.fr_FR: Vaincre des adversaires puissants, finir des donjons, des raids et d’autres activités sur les îles aux Dragons vous confère une chance d’obtenir une essence en bouteille.
description_blz.it_IT: Fornisce una probabilità di ottenere Essenza Imbottigliata sconfiggendo potenti nemici, completando spedizioni e incursioni e con diverse attività sulle Isole dei Draghi.
description_blz.ru_RU: Вы можете получить бутилированную сущность за победу над сильными врагами, прохождение подземелий, убийство рейдовых боссов и другую помощь Драконьим островам.
description_blz.ko_KR: 용의 섬에서 강력한 적 처치, 던전 및 공격대 완료, 기타 각종 활동 완료 시 일정 확률로 병에 담긴 정수를 획득합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 在巨龍群島上擊敗強敵、通關地城和團隊副本，以及完成各種活動後，你有一定機率獲得瓶裝精華。
description_blz.zh_CN: 你在巨龙群岛击败强大的敌人以及完成地下城、团队副本和其他各种各样的活动时有一定几率获得瓶装精华。
